metadata.description: A blistering one-shot written by Jamie Delano with art by Sean Phillips (HELLBLAZER). A work of fiction inspired by, but not based upon, true events, HELL ETERNAL follows three young Brits through a sordid life on the run as neo-Nazi paramilitaries who flee to America and meet with a bloody and disturbing end.
metadata.name: Vertigo Verite: Hell Eternal
